archimate:Capability.name: C.3.1.8. Issue, monitor and record grid adjustments
archimate:Capability.documentation: The ability to provide the contract for the adjustment to the contractor including the functional design/set of requirements. Monitoring the grid adjustment, including providing input to (long-term) planning in case of deviation outside the bandwidth and to functional design in case of deviation from the functional design/set of requirements. Ensuring and enabling processing of the adjustments of the assets in the asset registrations.
